Package com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.did

Hedera DID Method Specification implementation on top of Hedera Consensus Service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HcsDid
    Hedera Decentralized Identifier for Hedera DID Method specification based on HCS.
    HcsDidMessage
    The DID document message submitted to appnet's DID Topic.
    HcsDidResolver
    Resolves the DID from Hedera network.
    HcsDidRootKey
    Represents a root key of HCS Identity DID.
    HcsDidRootKeyBase  
    HcsDidRootZkKey  
    HcsDidTopicListener
    A listener of confirmed HcsDidMessage messages from a DID topic.
    HcsDidTransaction
    The DID document creation, update or deletion transaction.
